Package tanks.weapons.projectiles

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • tanks.weapons.projectiles.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bullet, Missile, PhantomBullet
    public abstract class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class representing a Projectile

      • Projectile

        Projectile​(double x,
           double y,
           double direction,
           int levelSizeX,
           int levelSizeY,
           int delay,
           Level level)
        Constructs a new Projectile, Sets the size
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the Projectile (top left)
        y - the y coordinate of the Projectile (top left)
        direction - the direction the Projectile is moving in
        levelSizeX - the x size of the Level
        levelSizeY - the y size of the Level
        delay - the delay between frames
        level - the Level that the Projectile is in

        Updates the Projectile Handles bouncing off Walls
